entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 06:12 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain and Fog
Temperature: 6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 6.0°C
Wind: S 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
